amendatorysection.catchline: Air carrier; exempt from commission regulation.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who transports passengers or property for the public in intrastate commerce by any airborne vehicle shall not be a common carrier subject to commission regulation.

annotation.para: Intrastate air carrier regulations are preempted by federal regulations. Pioneer Airways, Inc. v. City of Kearney, 199 Neb. 12, 256 N.W.2d 324 (1977).
